issue.title: [CF 352] Allow an icon to be easily moved into its own group
issue.body:
What I may allow is for an icon to be easily moved into its own group through the right-click-drag dropdown.

http://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/fileinfo.php?id=10855#comments


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #352 | Raw
